lead_paragraph: For the gender-fluid mind behind Hood by Air, —fashion’s current favorite street label — inspiration comes from his island childhood, Brooklyn dance clubs and his own spin on Warhol’s Factory.
snippet: For the gender-fluid mind behind Hood by Air, —fashion’s current favorite street label — inspiration comes from his island childhood, Brooklyn dance clubs and his own spin on Warhol’s Factory.
abstract: Profile of Brooklyn-based fashion designer Shayne Oliver, who has put an electrifying androgynous spin on street wear with his label Hood by Air.
